A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is now one of my favorite films in the saga! Kudos to Rian Johnson and Lucasfilm for having the guts to take this film in a different direction. The characters grow immensely from beginning to end and everyone has some interesting storylines set up for episode 9. Sure there were a couple things\, but I'm not going to complain\, this was an amazing movie.
